text: The Most Faithful Order of Perwira Agong Negara Brunei (), also translated as The Most Faithful Order of Gallantry of Brunei, is an order of Brunei. It was established on 28 November 1959 by Sultan Omar Ali Saifuddien III. The order consists of two classes: {| class="wikitable" !Class !Post-nominal !Ribbon |- |First Class |PANB |100px |- |Second Class |PaNB |100px |} == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1959 Category:1959 establishments in Brunei
title: Order of Perwira Agong Negara Brunei
